channel.title: Npc drop help! please awnser quick! i need this now!
channel.description:
//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount--
npcdrop = 795 3 6889 1-------- this one works
npcdrop = 83 3 7158 1-------- this one doesnt drop anything at all
some one help me please
all my drops work except the npcdrop = 83 one
for instance, its not cause my order is wrong
npcdrop = 2026 1 4716 1 4718 1 4720 1 4722 1 npcdrop = 2030 1 4753 1 4755 1 4757 1 4759 1 npcdrop = 2029 1 4745 1 4747 1 4749 1 4751 1 npcdrop = 2028 1 4732 1 4734 1 4736 1 4738 1 npcdrop = 2027 1 4724 1 4726 1 4728 1 4730 1 npcdrop = 2025 1 4708 1 4710 1 4712 1 4714 1
all those work

item.title: Npc drop help! please awnser quick! i need this now!
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

npcdrop = 2026 1 4716 1 4718 1 4720 1 4722 1
npcdrop = 2030 1 4753 1 4755 1 4757 1 4759 1
npcdrop = 2029 1 4745 1 4747 1 4749 1 4751 1
npcdrop = 2028 1 4732 1 4734 1 4736 1 4738 1
npcdrop = 2027 1 4724 1 4726 1 4728 1 4730 1
npcdrop = 2025 1 4708 1 4710 1 4712 1 4714 1
npcdrop = 83 3 7158 1

Try that.
